compliant.section: 4. On which legal basis do we process Personal Information?
compliant.legal provisions: lawfulness of processing - one of six grounds, such as consent

compliant.section: 5. Why do we use your Personal Information?
compliant.legal provisions: purpose limitation - specified, explicit and legitimate purposes

compliant.section:
6. To whom and where do we disclose your Personal Information?
• Third party recipients of the Personal Information
• International Transfer of Personal Information
compliant.legal provisions: data subject's right to information, restrictions on international transfers

compliant.section: 7. What do we do to keep your Personal Information secure?
8. What are your rights and how can you exercise them?
9. How long do we store your Personal Information?
compliant.legal provisions: storage limitation - no longer than necessary

non_compliant.section: 10. Third party links and products on our Website(s)

non_compliant.legal provisions: consent - specific, informed, unambiguous indication of wishes
